text: The Bombsters is a Canadian studio band based in Hamilton, Ontario. The group formed in 2009, and comprises Chas Andersson (keyboards, percussion and vocals), Ernest Mallais (guitars and vocals), Ryan Price (bass and vocals), Sean Rosen (guitars and vocals) and Mr. Somebody (drums). ==Discography== *Velocity (2010) *Highway 6 (2011) *The Bombsters (2013) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Musical groups established in 2009 Category:Musical groups from Hamilton, Ontario Category:Canadian power pop groups Category:2009 establishments in Ontario
title: The Bombsters
